Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

The Gnoph-keh is a powerful, time-traveling entity that can summon blizzards and intense cold around its body, affecting those within a certain radius. These attacks, which can be combined for increased effect, come at a cost to the Gnoph-keh's magic points. The entity also has physical attacks, such as its horn gore and claws, which can deal significant damage. Additionally, the Gnoph-keh has a unique appearance, consisting of an iridescent cone with various appendages and tentacles.
